alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pulaski County through 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just east of Downtown Little Rock. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Wrightsville... Argenta... Ironton... Sweet Home... Lakewood... Geyer Springs... Levy... State Fairgrounds... Burns Park... Protho Junction... Baseline... Park Hill... Higgins... College Station... Quapaw Quarter... Hillcrest Neighborhood... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
